httpMethod.title: HTTP Method
httpMethod.description: The HTTP method to use: GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE

requestBody.title: Request Body
requestBody.description: Payload data to be sent in the request body. Can be empty if there is no body.

urlIncludingParams.title: Endpoint URL
urlIncludingParams.description: The URL fragment of the REST endpoint starting with /. The Orgs base URL will be added
